content.title: Add Authentication to the App
content.body:
Let’s get started!
In this hike, we will:

  • Learn to configure an Identity Service
  • Map the identity service to the UI elements of an app

Before getting started, complete the following hikes:

  1. Import & Launch a Web App
  2. Create UI from Collections
    3.

Ensure that you open the same project that you have created in the previous hikes.
To open a closed project, from the main menu, navigate to Project > Open > HCL Reference Architecture > RecipientsWebApp.

When you are ready, click Start!
